======
Henry Eugene Henderson Jr.
3040 Dunaire Dr
Charlotte, NC 28205-4711

ph 704-536-1083

Henry Eugene Henderson was a WW I vet.Bur at Merietta, GA. with full military honors.
was a Carpenter/Painter. At one time was probably a dental lab technician. Was possibly a deputy sheriff in Laurens, SC before going to Atlanta, GA.
